nodes.text: Gerant was a male who accompanied Torva on her path to become a Jedi during the Galactic Civil War.

A male, Gerant was acquainted with a woman named Torva and traveled with her to a planet with a Force nexus within a mountain peak. As she entered the cave alone, Gerant remained without where he perched himself on top of a boulder. When Torva exited the cave, she proclaimed to have successfully moved closer to becoming a Jedi.
